articles.description: Disgraced ex-FA chief Greg Clarke has now stepped down from his role as FIFA vice-president, after a strongly-worded statement from football's governing body urging him to do so.
articles.content:
UEFA have confirmed Greg Clarke will step down from his role as FIFA vice-president, despite  originally asking the disgraced former FA chairman to stay on in the role.
